description:
A demon puts a carpenter in an unwanted deal, a fox learns of karma, and what is more important, honesty or obedience.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daiku to Oniroku / Kuma to Kitsune / Oshou to Kozou no Kawawatari
The Carpenter and Oniroku / The Bear and the Fox / The Priest and the Child Cross the River
大工と鬼六 / 熊と狐 / 和尚と小僧の川渡り
